bug.description: Application crashes upon clicking the SAVE button while creating a new the user, hence unable to create a new user in the application.
About the company screen. Red strip on the top of the screen
Login fails with a 500 error message on check-out page in Firefox, but works in Safari
App silently fails when invalid HTTPS certificate occurs. Should display actual error
Error message when clicking the upgrade button on the pricing page.

Steps to reproduce: 1. Log in 2. Open chat dialog 3. Click on the 'Settings' button => Add user 4. Add any user to a group conversation 5. Try to rename this group conversation
Actual result: the button "Rename conversation" is disabled
Layout issues in the 'Rules' screen.
When I remove an item from my shopping cart, I don't see the total order update

1. Go to the profile page 2. Enter username in login field 3. Enter incorrect password in password field
Expected outcome: Login fails with error message "incorrect user name or password"
Actual outcome: Login fails with "Incorrect Username"

The monthly revenue report is wrong.
The report values don't align with with the daily/weekly report values.
Wrong spelling in the heading 'Thes is our website!' on the landing page.

1. Launch App > Messages > New Message. 2. Enter recipient and message but leave "Subject" blank. 3. Tap Attach > Image and choose image file 4. Tap Send
Displays error: "Invalid format" when the only problem is missing Subject
The profile image doesn't load in the "Profile" section
Did not recieve confirmation email while creating new account

Keep getting error while trying to update billing information
Steps to reproduce: 1. Click on "My Profile" link 2. Select "Update billing information" link 3. All fields are disabled
Weirdly, can still click submit button

Did not get a notification when someone reacted to my thread response
Steps to reproduce: 1. User1 responds in a thread 2. User2 reacts to threaded post in 1 3. User1 does not see a notification on Web
When reviewing the "People who bought this item also bought" category in the Product page, it can be noticed that some of the items are missing their product image.

Missing price in item
steps: * go to main product page * go in the bottom of all products * go to 3rd item and you will see $0.00
Page gives "loadPayPRef" error when trying to purchase items using PayPal
The main image on the homepage is distorted on the iPhone X.
Correct the alignment and spacing of labels and toggle buttons under Settings-Preferences.

Product sorting changes price
When sorting products based on manufacturer, resulting list has different prices for same products displayed before sorting

The link for setting the user password that is sent upon registration is broken, thus making the whole registration process impossible.
Steps: 1. Open the webstore 2. Begin the account registration process. 3. Click on the link that is sent by email
The link takes the user to the "Lost Password" form
Outdated header image on "About" page

Logo on main landing page is twice the size of text
Not sure this is desired behavior
Cannot add note to order
When my cart contains one item, I am unable to add a second item via the "add to cart" button on the page.
Getting error "404. Page not found." when clicking FAQ link off of homepage
Need to add option for sorting products by color

Discount code doesn't work
Entered the code, got no error on the page, checked out and was charged full price.
Navigation menu is confusing. Don't know how to find contacts list
"About" page does not work using screen reader software. Needs to be updated

When I click the "Sign in with Google account" link, the window closes and I must reopen the app.
I get an error report that says "PlayOnLinux" crashed.

Can't add reviews to products
Clicked the "Add Review" button, but nothing happens

When accessing the content explorer in the admin as TestSuperuser on the QA environment, selecting the create new documents icon is throwing an error message – “Cannot read content”.
The other actions in the admin seem unaffected
Uploading a JPEG file (Profile Picture) in the registration page crashes the system
Refreshing product listings crashes page on Safari

Not all images load on home page when using Opera.
Chrome/Firefox/Edge working fine.

Broken links on tutorials page
Easily half the links don't work

Timeout error when trying to confirm purchase Shopping cart is full. I can see all items. However, when I click on the "continue to purchase", the page goes idle for about 30 seconds and then shows a timeout error

Unable to view different products on products page
Keep getting "Please disable pop-up blocker" message.
Can't send messages to more than one person Steps to reproduce: I. Open messages page II. In the "To" field, add a username III. Try to add another username but nothing happens.
"View User Profile" returns incorrect information about user's location
Can't open "Terms of Service" link on product page The link appears to be dead.

Product purchase page allows for invalid shipping date.
Entered 2020-06-31 and it accepted.
Note: there are only 30 days in June

Constantly getting signed out
I am able to login using my username/password, but after searching for a few minutes I'm automatically logged out and have to sign back in

Android problem
Steps:
1. Open a track with related Label 2. Tap on the Info icon (top right corner) 3. Tap on Lavel name, nothing happens
Expected behavior: Label screen should be opened
Package shipping information being displayed using wrong time zone

Can't reset password
Password reset page says it has sent email, but never receieve email
Unidentified product is being added to the cart after gift wrapping option was selected.
